name: EXIT Foundation
goal:
EXIT Foundation for the past 20 years positioned itself as a leader in mobilizing public opinion and decision-making in the field of youth development, creative industries and destination branding by using top global artistic, educational and charity events. EXIT Foundation is the organizer of EXIT festival, world-renowned and award-winning summer music festival, that for years has been one of the most popular world music festivals, according to leading world media such as CNN, BBC, Times, Guardian, MTV and others. For the past 18 years our festival has been visited by over three million people from more than 60 countries.
EXIT is the only major world festival that originated from a student movement for peace, democratic and social changes in Serbia and in the region of Southeast Europe back in 2000, created through social activism and established by NGO sector which remains a key part of its functioning to this day. Some of its latest awards are the Best Major European Festival in 2014 and 2017 which is the biggest festival recognition in the world and "Best Summer" Music Festival in Europe for 2016, leading European travel award. EXIT festival is a platform where world cultures, music and values of various countries can be promoted to more than 200 000 people, each year, from more than 60 countries.
With the launch of new festivals under the EXIT brand in the countries of the region (eg Budva, Montenegro since 2014, Timisoara, Romania since 2015, Umag, Croatia since 2017 and Festival 84, Jahorina, Bosnia and Herzegovina since this year), EXIT has established a leadership position in merging and connecting a large number of young people from the whole region encouraging youth cooperation and mobility and connecting the region through art, culture and creativity.
Our mission is to spark positive social changes and speed up the evolution of human consciousness by using creative industries, top global artistic, educational and charity events as a means to spread the message of love and freedom to the whole planet; all this with a goal to make our vision come to life – Humanity and Earth in harmony on all levels; local, regional and global.
As the only major global festival created out of the social activism, using the power of its brand, EXIT Foundation has successful experience of 18 years of social activism and more than 1000 actions, initiatives, conferences, projects, workshops, charity work implemented so far.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, International co-operation and development, Youth
euInitiatives: Having in mind the importance of the Berlin process in improving regional cooperation and accelerating the Europeanisation of the Western Balkans we took part in the Civil Society Forum of the Western Balkans Summit Series as good communication is one of the key conditions for the Berlin Process and we also have been involved as a speaker at the 2017 Western Balkans Summit in Trieste, Italy.
